name: Abyss of Kings (Star Banner Games)
description: This game was made in 12 days for the Black and White Jam with the Theme "The Deep".  I got absolutely obsessed with working on this game and I am really proud of what it's become. To be clear, the only reason this game had any chance to exist in such a short time was because I used the Unity Frameworks and Tools that I've been developing over the past ~2 years. As far as I could see it's allowed to use frameworks in the jam and most of it is free for everyone to use on the asset store. Still, I wanted to mention it because building this from scratch in such a short time would have been pure insanity.
